data.title: The IMG Event ‚Ñ¢ Reviews
data.meta_description: Do you agree with The IMG Event ‚Ñ¢'s 4-star rating? Check out what 31 people have written so far, and share your own experience.
data.text:
Project IMG is bringing the comunity together!

I had the chance to attend to the Miami 2024 IMG Project event, it was my first experience and I loved it. I want to thank Dr. Sebas and all the people that helped to create this space were IMGs can unit and support each other. I would love to attend the NY event!

Date of experience : April 06, 2024

Best IMG Conference Available!

For over 16 years, I have supported IMGs on their journey toward attaining medical residency in the U.S. During this time, I have not encountered an organization more devoted to supporting the international medical student community. They provide accessible platforms for networking, development, and career advancement that are unparalleled. I have attended two conferences and they were some of the best students conferences I have been to.

Date of experience : April 05, 2024

The BEST organizations for IMGs all around the world!

I have had the unique honor of not only being a part of the Project IMG and its sister organization, The IMG Event, but also being a committee member and executive organizer who was able to witness how much these organizations have grown since their inception. I can speak from first hand experience that Dr. Sebastian Arruarana, the Founder of both organizations, genuinely wants to help International Medical Graduates (IMGs) and tirelessly works hard to advocate for and create more opportunities for IMGs all around the world.

Project IMG and The IMG Event form a comprehensive network, both online and in person, offering a sense of community, unity, and support for IMGs. Project IMG has diligently provided resources, information, and awareness about the USMLE journey and the MATCH process. Meanwhile, The IMG Event serves as a platform for IMGs from around the globe to connect, network, and engage with esteemed figures in the medical field, through events held nationally and internationally.

Together, these organizations address a large yet often overlooked population in the US medical education system: International Medical Graduates. Project IMG and The IMG Event are invaluable resources for any IMG seeking knowledge, connections, and the opportunity to advocate for others on the same journey.

Date of experience : April 28, 2024

Event which is worth attending. ü•∞

It was really great experience interacting with Dr sebas and team. So many great speakers with so much information and motivation.

I love how PIMG helping student like me to make their dream come true. Glad that I attended this event and in future if I get more chance to attend, I'll definitely go there one more time.

Thank you tema IMG and Dr. Sebas for organizing this event here in Philippines. Can't wait to see you all again. ü•≥

Starting a long journey with big smile on my face! üòÉ

Date of experience : April 21, 2023

3 cheers for Dr Sebas and Dhruva (organizer from GMERS Vadodara and my vvv good friend)

I loved the initiative of organizing a mega event such as an IMG meet up in a small town such as Vadodara, Gujarat. It gives the Indian IMG the much needed camaraderie and support to work towards their goal via this long and arduous journey. Seeing successful people and listening to their stories is just the boost of motivation we need. Love being a part of this community and loved volunteering for this event. Hoping to be a part of the organizing team next time!

Kudos to Dr Sebastian for bring us IMGs together ü•∫‚ù§Ô∏è

Date of experience : April 15, 2023

The IMG event transforms the journey of IMGs‚Ä¶

The IMG event transforms the journey of IMGs working to build their careers in the US. Thanks to these events, I have connected with amazing people from all over on this journey. It has provided guidance and a sense of community and this has helped motivate and inspire to continue despite all obstacles and challenges. 100% recommended to any IMG wanting to practice in the US!

It‚Äôs truly revolutionary

Date of experience : March 18, 2023

IMG event NY

If you‚Äôre an IMG and don‚Äôt know where you start or don‚Äôt have any connections, you need to attend this event! It‚Äôs the perfect way to network, hear others talk about their experiences and give you the motivation you need to prepare for match season. This is a great community to belong to.

Date of experience : August 27, 2022

Hello everyone, I am Sanskruti Patel Final year UG at Smt. NHL MMC, Ahmedabad. Completed Step 1

Hello everyone. It was such an amazing event organised by the Project Img event team. I had the best opportunity of interaction with all the fellow members. It was worth attending this event, got my doubts cleared and learned so many new things. Looking forward to expand my IMGs network with all these people.

Date of experience : April 15, 2023

IMG Event: Philippines!

I attended the IMG Event in Philippines on 22 April, 2023 for the first time, and it was such a great experience!

It felt great to have insights from doctors and students that have themselves cleared pathways that we plan on taking further! We found guidance and mentors yesterday, and I'm really grateful for that!

Thank you so much for this project, looking forward to attending many more such events in the future!

Date of experience : April 22, 2023

The day I learnt so much...

Can't be thankful enough to img event and project img for giving us this space to connect with people from different backgrounds, but running the same marathon.

Learning about the ups and downs of this journey and how everyone is determined to make it to their dream residency is so inspiring.

Biggest shout out to the coordinators and organizers who did an amazing job of hosting us. They did everything in their capacity to provide us with the best networking opportunities.

From the pre event to the last panel of speakers, the entire experience was so enriching.

Thank you, Dr. Sebas, for creating this beautiful community. I am so grateful for your contributions in helping us achieve our goals.

Date of experience : April 16, 2023

It was a truly wonderful experience to be part of Img event.

Hello everyone ,

First of all I would like to congratulate and appreciate the organisers and volunteers for conducting and managing such a wonderful event. Grateful to all speakers for sharing their experiences and knowledge with us.

Secondly, to all attendees, it was a pleasant experience to talk with so many new faces who are on same path and like minded.

I would love to collaborate for research opportunities as I am interested in research activities.

I m looking forward to connect with you more all Img community members.

Raj Patel

Intern

M. P. Shah government medical college

Jamnagar

Date of experience : April 15, 2023

Wonderful organization with passionate leaders!

One of the best organizations that I am fortunate to know. It is truly a blessing for all IMG‚Äôs and anyone who is pursuing medicine in the United States. The founder and all the individuals working with them are wonderful and extremely passionate about IMG‚Äôs. It has been a pleasure to get to know them and I hope to be a part of this wonderful organization as well as part of the events in the near future.

Date of experience : April 17, 2023

The IMG chapter: INDIA

The event was amazing , fun , informative and what not ! And the best part was networking .

It was great networking with all of you .

Being a part of event as a volunteer was a lot more opportunistic for me .

It was fun working with all the volunteers and organisers .

Thank you to all the organisers for such an amazing event and cheers to their hardwork .

Date of experience : April 15, 2023

I met my community

I met my community

The road for IMGs is very hard and isolating, at the event I was moved by the inspirational stories of some of the speakers, and others gave insightful advice as how to match. You were able to start networking at the pre event cocktail and everyone that came alone met a group they identified with. From the event, I now have a study partner and others that support me since they are ahead of me in this path. I recommend this event to anyone no matter where they are in their journey. The road is long but it can be less of a burden with others to walk with you.

Date of experience : March 18, 2023

It's was very inspiring

It's was very nice, inspiring and motivational event.. It gives me right direction of my dreams... I really enjoyed it... Specifically the Doctors with there journey and experience really inspired me a lot... I hope with the help of the knowledge that i got through this IMG event will help me to achieve my dreams... Thank you for everything everyone.... üòäü´∂ü´∞

Date of experience : April 22, 2023
